AR 26. The targets may cover its own operations and/or its upstream and downstream value chain.
AR 27. The undertaking may specify whether the target addresses shortcomings related to the
Substantial Contribution criteria for Water and Marine Resources as defined in the
Commission delegated acts adopted pursuant to Article 12(2) of Regulation (EU) 2020/852.
